name: shapes
desc: Creates a contain to hold any number of shape object.  Shapes can be styled and placed anywhere on a chart.

attrs.name: angle-endangleEnd
attrs.desc: Sets the end angle of a pie shape.

attrs.name: angle-startangleStart
attrs.desc: Sets the beginning angle of a pie shape.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the shape

attrs.name: hover-statehoverState
attrs.desc: Customize shape behavior when a user hovers over it.

attrs.name: id
attrs.desc: Id of the shape

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Add a label to the shape.

attrs.name: slice
attrs.desc: Sets the radius of the inner ring of a pie shape.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the shape

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. The higher the value, the less transparent the object appears.  Value ranges from 0.1 to 1 Requires the formatting 0.x

attrs.name: angle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.  Colors can be entered by name (e.g. "red", "blue", "yellow"), in hexadecimal notation (e.g. "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FFFF00"), or in RGB notation (e.g. "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(0,0,255)", "rgb(255,255,0)").  One color will set a solid background color, two colors will, by default, create a horizontal gradient.  For more complex gradients, use gradient-colors and gradient-stops.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-2.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-1.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes. Relies on border-width setting.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. Defaults to black when border-color is not defined. See also line-width for closed shapes.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear fill is drawn.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply to the fill. Positive value moves the offset right.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset to apply to the fill. With a radial fill, positive value moves the offset down. With a linear fill, affects location of the gradient stop.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the background gradient fill type to either linear or radial.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object. Used with gradient stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets a set of steps corresponding for each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors) of the object. Paired with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the item id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: line-colorlineColor
attrs.desc: Sets the line color of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: line-gap-sizelineGapSize
attrs.desc: Can be used to create custom dashed or dotted lines when used with line-segment-size.  This will control the size of the gaps between each line segment.

attrs.name: line-segment-sizelineSegmentSize
attrs.desc: Can be used to create custom dashed or dotted lines when used with line-gap-size.  This will control the size of the visible segment of line.

attrs.name: line-stylelineStyle
attrs.desc: Sets the style applied to lines and borders of the object.

attrs.name: line-widthlineWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the line width of the object, applicable on non-closed shapes. See also border-width for closed shapes.

attrs.name: map
attrs.desc: Sets the map id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: offset-roffsetR
attrs.desc: Sets a radial offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: offset-xoffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: offset-yoffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: points
attrs.desc: Sets the coordinates of the object/shape points.

attrs.name: rules
attrs.desc: Rules allows you to include logic within your JSON code to apply sets of attributes to certain aspects of your chart that meet a specified requirement.  See rules for usage information.

attrs.name: shadow
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object gets a shadow or not.

attrs.name: shadow-alphashadowAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: shadow-angleshadowAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the shadow underneath the object.

attrs.name: shadow-blurshadowBlur
attrs.desc: Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-colorshadowColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

attrs.name: shadow-distanceshadowDistance
attrs.desc: Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Sets the size of the object/shape.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Sets the type of the object/shape.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Sets the visibility of the object.  Allows you to turn off the object without removing lines of JSON.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.

attrs.name: z-indexzIndex
attrs.desc: Sets the z position of the object. Objects with higher z indexes will appear "above" those with lower z index values.
